metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4561 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the cgierror function in CGI.pm in ikiwiki before 3.20160506 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors involving an error message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-4561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20180228-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20180228-1').
